SA11sanss13u:4_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvâivaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati /
SA11sanss13u:17_0: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati /
SA11sanss13u:28_0: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāyêti dehêti bhogêti āśrayêti śarīram iti kuṇapêti āyatanam iti /
SA11sanss13u:32_0: anityo vatâyaṃ kāyo 'cirasthitiko maraṇaparyavasānêti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati /
SA11sanss13u:38_0: so 'nityaḥ kāyêti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati /
SA11sanss13u:39_0: anityaḥ kāyêti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:40_0: anityaḥ kāyêti jīvitenâśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:41_0: anityaḥ kāyêti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇâdhyavasānaṃ na karoti /
SA11sanss13u:43_0: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyânudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti /
SA11sanss13u:46_0: yathā ca tathāgatakāye nâśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanss13u:47_0: so nâśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātîty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:49_0: yad utâyaṃ kāyo 'nupūrvasamudāgato 'nupūrvavināśo paramâṇusaṃcayaḥ śuṣirônnāmâvanāmau navavraṇamukharomakūpasrāvī valmīkavadāsīviṣanivāsaḥ [[DOUBT]] /
SA11sanss13u:86_0: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:90_0: kas tatra rāgo bahumānatā vā //aṅgāram ādāya yathā hi bālo /
SA11sanss13u:92_0: yāti kṣayaṃ nâiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathâbhimānā //
SA11sanss13u:93_0: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram /
SA11sanss13u:94_0: sûdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatâbhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam //
SA11sanss13u:97_0: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat /
SA11sanss13u:105_0: asvâdhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūtêti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss13u:107_0: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre /
SA11sanss13u:108_0: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanânupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhâśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:110_0: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nâsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati /
SA11sanss13u:115_0: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanss13u:116_0: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgânuśayaṃ pratijahāti /
SA11sanss13u:117_0: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣânuśayaṃ prajahāti /
SA11sanss13u:118_0: yadâduṣkhâsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:127_0: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti /
SA11sanss13u:133_0: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat /
SA11sanss13u:134_0: yad aduṣkhâsukhaṃ tad anātmakam ity ādi //
SA11sanss13u:136_0: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpâkṣaṇôpapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati //
SA11sanss13u:137_0: pe //api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanôpādānaṃ vedanôpalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanêty ādi /
SA11sanss13u:141_0: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate //
SA11sanss13u:143_0: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā //
SA11sanss13u:148_0: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā /
SA11sanss13u:155_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nâdhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nôbhayam antareṇôpalabhyate /
SA11sanss13u:156_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapârūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham
SA11sanss13u:159_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:160_0: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ /na paśyanti na drakṣyanti /
SA11sanss13u:163_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti //pe //
SA11sanss13u:164_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam anavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:165_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpârcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:167_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapâkāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate /
SA11sanss13u:170_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā /
SA11sanss13u:179_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśârāmaṃ makṣikêva tailapātre /
SA11sanss13u:180_0: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate /
SA11sanss13u:182_0: yan nôpalabhyate tan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:183_0: yan nâivâtītaṃ nânāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:184_0: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nêvâsti na nâstîty ādi //
SA11sanss13u:186_0: āryaratnacūḍasūtre 'py āha / sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nâdhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss13u:187_0: na bahirdhā cittaṃ samanupaśyati /na skandheṣu cittaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss13u:192_0: tasyâivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate /
SA11sanss13u:194_0: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:195_0: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:197_0: atha yad evâlambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:203_0: na tenâivâṅguly-agreṇa tad evâṅguly-agraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate /
SA11sanss13u:204_0: nâiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum //
SA11sanss13u:205_0: pe //punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutânavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya /
SA11sanss13u:207_0: dūraṃgamacāriṇo 'śarīrasya laghuparivartino viṣayalolasya ṣaḍāyatanagocarasyâparâparasaṃprayuktasya cittasyâvasthānām ekâgratâśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathâikâgratâvikṣepêty ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti /
SA11sanss13u:214_0: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatîtîyam ucyate viṭhapanêty ādi /
SA11sanss13u:216_0: dharme dharmânudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
SA11sanss13u:217_0: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ /
SA11sanss13u:218_0: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:219_0: sa sarvadharmâniḥsaraṇam iti viditvânāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate /
SA11sanss13u:220_0: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss13u:227_0: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva /
SA11sanss13u:229_0: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatîti /
SA11sanss13u:230_0: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmânupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharatâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss13u:233_0: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate vôtpadyate vā /
SA11sanss13u:240_0: yante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vâkuśalā vā
SA11sanss13u:244_0: na câhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi //
SA11sanss13u:246_0: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittânusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti /
SA11sanss13u:249_0: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ /
SA11sanss13u:255_0: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:256_0: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate //
SA11sanss13u:257_0: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
SA11sanss13u:258_0: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekâikaśu nâsti vartanā //
SA11sanss13u:260_1: /bījasya sato yathâṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa câivâṅkuro /
SA11sanss13u:261_0: na cânya tato na câiva tat /
SA11sanss13u:264_0: saṃskārâvidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ /
SA11sanss13u:265_0: saṃskārâvidya câiva hi śūnyâite prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:266_0: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na côpalabhyate /
SA11sanss13u:267_0: na ca tatra na câiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāranucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:268_0: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihôpajāyate /
SA11sanss13u:269_0: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na câiva cakṣuṣi //
SA11sanss13u:270_0: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmêti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ /
SA11sanss13u:273_0: akahiñci gatam anāgataṃ śūnya māyôpama yogi paśyati //
SA11sanss13u:278_0: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate //
SA11sanss13u:279_0: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanss13u:280_0: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nâpy agatiś ca labhyate //
SA11sanss13u:282_0: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramârthatu nôpalabhyate //
SA11sanss13u:283_0: kaṇṭhâuṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā /
SA11sanss13u:284_0: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣarâikâika tu nôpalabhyate //
SA11sanss13u:285_0: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī /
SA11sanss13u:288_0: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakôpamāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:290_0: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim /
SA11sanss13u:292_0: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā /
SA11sanss13u:293_0: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam anāgamanaṃ na labhyate //
SA11sanss13u:294_0: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate /
SA11sanss13u:295_0: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati //
SA11sanss13u:300_0: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nâpi rākṣasāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:301_0: manuṣyā vâmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate /
SA11sanss13u:302_0: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate //
SA11sanss13u:303_0: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ //
SA11sanss13u:304_0: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ /
SA11sanss13u:305_0: na côtpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmêha pṛcchasi //
